MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.55pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to further investigate and locate an underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:28PM on Wednesday 03 February 2021.
